https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null An escaped religious fanatic Jason Fry, goes on a killing spree after those he believes to be sinners. Dr. Landers, his former shrink is the only one who can stop him. Fry's got a list and he's checking it twice for those naughty not nice! Bible Belt Slasher: The Holy Terror
